description: THE APARTMENT IS IN EXCELLENT CONDITION. LOOK FORWARD TO SEEING YOU.
A large sized furnished double room with plenty of space, with all the bedding and linen, towels provided at a very reasonable rate for the location.
This 4 bedroom apartment is in the heart of Central London only minutes away from Oxford Street, Marble Arch, Hyde Park, Edgware Road, Paddington, Notting Hill and Harley Street.
The apartment is on the 2nd floor of a block in a quiet residential area.
The flat has a, fitted kitchen and a good-sized bathroom with separate wc .
The large kitchen has all mod cons with a dining table.
Included in our daily rates are:
-Clean bathroom with shampoo and body wash.
-Use of the washing machine with soap.
-Fully equipped kitchen including Washing machine, fridge freezer, microwave, kettle, cooking facilities.
Heathrow airport is no more that 45 minutes away as Paddington Station only 10-15 minutes away,
Ideally located with 3 underground/metro stations within 5 minutes walk from the apartment.
The apartment is served by numerous bus routes day and night.
THIS IS THE PLACE TO BE IF YOU WANT TO EXPERIENCE LONDON AT ITS BEST!!!

the premier shopping street in Europe is under a mile(1km) walk from the apartment. It is one and a half miles(2km) from end to end and is a shoppers paradise. Most shops open 10am until 6 or 7pm. Many also open on Sunday from 12 to 6pm with late nights on Thursday. Oxford Street is best known for Selfridges and the other big department stores which are all found in the section from Marble Arch to Oxford Circus, along with most of the big-name multinationals such as Nike, Primark, Topshop, Apple, etc. It's more of the same towards Tottenham Court Road, but generally on a smaller scale. Oxford Street is said to be the busiest shopping street in Europe.

The section of Edgware Road near to Marble Arch is famous for its distinctive Middle-Eastern character. Lebanese restaurants, shisha cafes and clubs line both sides of the road, with some staying open late into the night. Marble Arch station is a few minutes walk from the southern end of Edgware Road.

Just a short step away from the tourist hordes, the apartment still has the feel of a real neighbourhood, the wealthy residents are becoming ever more attractive as Harley Street, the traditional home of England's best doctors, has recently become the heart of the UK's flourishing plastic surgery industry.

The beautiful architecture (the Wallace Collection is a must) and the open spaces of Regent's Park and Hyde Park make this a fine area to have a wander, when the sun's out there are fewer places in London as scenic and special as Hyde Park.

While Marylebone High Street is absolutely charming, lined with traditional pubs, beautiful boutiques and shops (including the flagship Daunt Books) and excellent local restaurants as well as an impressive mix of hotels - and a farmer's market every Saturday.
A short walk from Marylebone is the home of the most famous fictional detective in the world 'Sherlock Holmes' bachelor flat at 221B Baker Street and the popular waxworks at Madame Tussauds.
We have Italian, Chinese speaking staff available. Please call us for any enquiries.
PLEASE NOTE KEYS ARE KEPT IN A SEPARATE LOCATION.
THIS WILL BE EMAILED TO YOU THE WEEKEND PRIOR TO YOUR STAY
room_name: Dbl Room-Egware Rd, Oxford St, IB2
address: 伦敦, 英格兰, 英国

rooms_name: Dbl Room-Egware Rd, Oxford St, IB2
Dbl Room-Egware Rd, Oxford St, IB1
Dbl Room-Egware Rd, Oxford St, IB4
Dbl Room-Egware Rd, Oxford St, IB3

review.comments: I didn't meet carrie, but she was so kind answering to all of my question immediately every time I needed something! The first thing I've noticed as I saw the flat was the cleaness of it. Everything was tidy and clean, a lovely place to stay. Was also so confortable and warm, so close to the tube station and full of nice people to chat from time to time. I will for sure come back to carrie's house! I'd advice it to everyone!

L'accès à l'appartement nous a très bien été expliqué.
L'appartement est bien situé, dans un quartier avec restaurants et commerces à proximité.
Quelques inconvénients : mauvaise insonorisation et chambre petite.
Bon rapport qualité/ prix, à conseiller.
The host canceled this reservation 11 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

It was a very pleasant stay at Carrie's apartment. I didn't manage to meet Carrie, but her instructions to retrieve my room keys were clear enough. 

The apartment is nicely situated near the Edgware Road underground station, so getting everywhere is really convenient. The room can be a little small even for one person, but it's very clean and I don't have any problems with it :) I also met with some other AirBnB-ers who were in the other rooms, and they were very pleasant people. 

Thanks very much Carrie for the nice stay on your apartment. I had a great time in London!

Carrie provided excellent directions to the apartment and how to get the keys. The building is located in a quiet residential area, very close (1 block) to Edgware Rd tube station. There are plenty of restaurants around and a supermarket around the corner. The apartment and the room were clean. Wi-fi worked perfectly. The other guests staying at the apartment were very nice. I would definitely stay again if going back to London.

Carries Wohnung ist sehr zentral gelegen. 
Die Zimmer sind klein, jedoch ist die Wohnküche sehr geräumig und gut ausgestattet, so dass man sich auch dort aufhalten kann. Allerdings sind alle vier Schlafzimmer der Wohnung mit Gästen belegt, so dass es im Bad und Toilette zu Engpässen kommt. Dennoch hat es uns vorallem aufgrund der super Lage sehr gut gefallen! :)

The host provided very clear directions to the property and how to get the keys. The room and flat were spotlessly clean. It was in a quiet residential area. I was attending a conference nearby so the location was perfect. I hope to book the room again for next year's conference.
El piso esta bastante bien, la habitacion quiza un poco pequeña...  pero el piso es comodo y de facil acceso. Bien comunicado.

The instructions the host left for accessing the room were clear and we encountered no problems. The room was clean and the surrounding area was ok. Very close to the tube. Had a slight problem with WIFI when we arrived but the host cleared it up promptly. The room was small but perfect for our needs.

Non ho avuto occasione di incontrare Carrie, che però mi ha fornito indicazioni accurate via email su come raggiungere la casa e dove prendere le chiavi. 
Il quartiere può dare una cattiva prima impressione, ma è in realtà abbastanza tranquillo. 
La casa è ben tenuta e pulita, la stanza un pò piccola ma confortevole, il letto è molto comodo. 
Purtroppo quando ho avuto bisogno di Carrie, al momento del check-in, non ha risposto alle mie chiamate nè mi ha richiamato o risposto alla mail inviatale. 
Inoltre, non ho potuto usugruire del wifi presente in casa, in quanto non mi era stata fornita la password. Mi è stata fornita solo all'ultimo giorno della mia permanenza, tra l'altro errata. 
Nel complesso, di positivo c'è la casa, pulita e ad un prezzo ragionevole, di contro l'host Carrie, molto disponibile via mail prima dell'arrivo a Londra, non lo è stata altrettanto durante il mio soggiorno.

The room is  so small  therefore super close to the underground edgward road which is very nice. 
But I m not quite sure it's a safe community. The elevator has a smell of weed, and there's drunk people on the street shouting...
the apartment is nice and very central, the area is very interesting with lots of lebanese restaurant, you can meet people from all over the world at carrie's. I recomment it!

The apartment was easy to find and easy to get into. The room was small. Not sure I could stay much longer then a few days in there, but was all we needed for our trip. Kitchen was clean as well as the bathrooms. We were missing toilet paper for a couple days, otherwise our other mates were quiet. Also, the wifi didn't work the whole time, which was a bummer, as it was one of the main reasons for choosing the apartment.

I was rather disapointed of the place. I had the expectation that the apartment was very close to Oxford street, but it wasn't that close to Oxford st. Besides that there were no soap or light at the toilet and since there is no window at the toilet there were completly dark. The kitchen wasn't too clean either. I felt very mislead by the reviews and the describtion of the apartment.

We had a little incident getting into the apartment when we got there: the door wouldn't open and nobody answered. Carrie took care of it right away even though it was 6am on a Sunday. The apartment is just like in the pictures, the kitchen was super spacious and fully equipped. Everything was really clean. Also very well located. Lots of restaurants and markets around the corner and the underground station just 2 blocks away. Would definitely come back! The other guests staying at the time were very nice as well :)
We enjoyed our stay. Everything was as described. Carrie left clear instructions for us. It was a great portal to see London by! The apt is very close to important tube stations.

1. The room was not as close to Oxford street as the ad makes you think, though from the far end(primark) it is about a 15 minute walk. 
2. The neighbourhood was very shady, as two 18 year old girls we did not feel safe. You have to enter a gate to get to the building, inside this gate were people smoking weed and making obscene comments at us during the night. 
3. The room itself (2) was pretty small but very clean and comfortable. Good enough for us.
4. Fulltime equipes kitchen en bathroom were clean as (website hidden) did not work.
6. Free cereal, thee, coffee, shampoo and showergels were available, which was really Nice.

All in all we had a great and comfortable stay !

We had a great stay in London at Carrie's apartment. The location was fantastic, being so close to Edgware Rd station meant we had easy access to 3 tube lines. There were heaps of buses around the area and you are within walking distance to Abbey Rd and Lord's. Also close by to the apartment was a Sainsbury's which was very handy for buying food or snacks whenever we needed them. 

We enjoyed the experience of staying in the apartment, sharing with 6 other travelers each with separate lockable rooms. This was great for meeting people and the kitchen provided a great communal space. 
We loved having access to the kitchen as well as a washing machine. 

Our room was one of the cheaper ones, therefore smaller but it was still adequate for the price. We had some issues as the bed was broken by the time we had arrived. Communication with Carrie can be difficult but the bed was able to be fixed within a couple of days and we were happy with this result. 

We consistently found it difficult communicating with Carrie both in the planning of our stay and during but despite this we still enjoyed our stay in London.
Carrie does not live in the appartment, but she gave us a very detailed description of the key location and how to find the appartment. This went all very smooth.

Es war ein toller Aufenthalt in London und die Wohnung von Carrie ist wirklich sehr zentral gelegen. Carrie hat die Adresse, die Schlüsselübergabe bzw. Abholung super beschrieben. Alles in allem hat es mir sehr gut gefallen.  Ich hab nette Leute in den vier Tagen in der Wohnung kennengelernt. Die Küche war ein prima Treffpunkt. Vielen Dank und lieben Gruß aus Düsseldorf von Jasmin
Nice small room. Shared bathroom was fine. Good location. You get what you pay for. It's a council flat in a great location

Lovely stay. Apartment is how it is resembled in photos. Had all the accommodations you could need, and gaining access into the apartment wasn't too difficult. Very close to two tube stations. If in London again, we would definitely stay here again

I stayed in room number 2 it was a small one but convenient for two 
The kitchen is spacious enough to have about six or seven seated persons 
the place is 5 mins walk from the underground station
I wasnt able to find the key but carrie answered to her cell phone and explained to me how to get it
Byt má skvělou polohu blízko (website hidden) hezky zařízený, hlavně kuchyně. Pokoj je sice malinký,ale plně nám dostačoval. Byli jsme spokojení.Potěšila nás káva a čaj volně k použití.
Carrie's  home is cozy and calm. Easy to get by paddington station. Easy to access the subway. Market is just one block from the ap. Elevator is durty, I used the stairs.

Finding the key was not a problem, as the instructions by Carrie were detailed. Though all the rooms were booked, we did not have to wait long till the toilet or the bathroom are free (there is a sink in both, which is very convenient). It was comfortably warm in the flat and in our room, which is not to be taken for granted in the UK :) Just a few minor things:
* The bed in room 2 is extremely squeaky, it literally creaks with your every small movement.
* There was no hairdryer, so remember to bring one if you need it.
* The washing machine leaks when it flushes the water (the pipe connection is not leakproof), so be ready to wipe the floors if you use the machine.

The location and cleanliness was very good, and we still enjoyed our stay - thank you Carrie!

review.response:
Thank you
Would be great to have you back
review.comments:
Audrey and I stayed few days in London and  it was an amazing  experience! The accommodation was welcoming and well situated! 
The bedroom was well decorated ! 
And the appartment is nice with   spacious  kitchen and all the equipment  you need !  
Thank you to carrie tohost  us for our trip in London !

Perfectly situated in the middle of my favourite muslim hangout. Nice, clean and working facilities. A hotel room at this standard would be three times the cost (been there). Looking forward to coming back to this great place. (note to self: Bring earplugs if you want to sleep with the window open for it's a bit oft a noisy neighbourhood)

Located in a council estate with a view over a barbed-wired enclosure the room was small clean.  Although a number of other people were staying in the place I didn't actually meet Carrie. The main hitch with this listing was finding the key but after I located that everything went ok.  Close to paddington station.

Carrie was nice to explain the instructions to get her keys to the house. Its confusing however we managed to locate it. The place is small though but overall is a cosy place to stay. The area is abit shady so it can be quiet at night.
The house was as in the photos. The common areas were tidy and everything was OK. Quite place in the centre.
It was very nice and we had no problems with the apartment. The people were very friendly and the location was super good. Thank you Carrie!

The instructions we got before arriving were detailed and helpful. The room was small but we knew that when we booked it. It was comfortable and clean. The bathroom and shower were also clean (although the shower was a bit chilly and the water pressure not so good). The location was great. All in all we enjoyed our stay!
지하철역과 버스타는 곳이랑 가까워서 너무 좋았어요. 밤되면 인적이 줄어서 처음엔 걱정되었는데 막상 지내고 보내 큰 문제 없었어요. 따뜻한물도 나오고 씻는곳 화장실 분리되어있어 좋았어요. 단점은 작은방은 캐리어를 펼칠수 있는 공간이 좁았다는 것ㅠ

The apartment is well located, it's 5 mins walk from the tube station. The kitchen was well equipped.
We were in room 2 and the room didn't reach our expectations. The carpet was a little bit dirty. It is quite cold during the night because there were no heater in the room.
The sink in the bathroom was blocked and the water pressure was low.
We didn't see our host but during our stay in London she replied our questions very quickly.

Unfortunately my experience to Carry's house is so so, nothing really bad but nothing really good. In my opinion i believe that she should be more present on the apartament because We never met her.
I don't think it's nice after a long journey to look for the master look to get keys and then after all look for the appartment. It was a strong rainy night and it hasn't been comfortable.
Then about the room Number 2 i am sorry but it 's so small and my husband and i couldn't move together on the same time, it's incredibly small and for me it should be just for one person. Last point that i didn't like too much, only 1 toilet and just 1 shower are absolutely not enough for 8 people and When i was there,rooms were totally full.that  was my opinion about the apartament that for Someone Who doesn't care it can be good for location and price. I will not come back there again.

Unfortunately we haven't met Carrie but she gave us ll the required informations!
The room was exactly as in the pictures and the apartment was nice and clean. The position is very good, subway is really close. We really enjoyed our stay in Carrie's flat.

Die Lage des Zimmers war hervorragend. Auch die Einrichtung ist in Ordnung. Das Zimmer ist jedoch sehr klein, was aber nicht wirklich stört. Das Bett jedoch ist sehr unstabil/unbequem.
Toll war, dass man sich jederzeit am Kaffee- und Teevorrat bedienen konnte.
Carrie hatten wir bei unserem gesamten Aufenthalt nicht kennengelernt, aber Emailkontakt war ausreichend.
Alles in allem ein super Zimmer für einen Kurztrip nach London.

Getting the key was a little tricky, but worked out good in the end. All in all I would totally recommend the room! It was clean and looked exactly as shown on the pictures. Great area and connection to the London underground, aswell! We enjoyed it!
너무 좋음

The house was as advertised: good location, room sizes as listed. We shared with several couples and enjoyed getting to know them. There was little fight over the kitchen, bathrooms, etc. as we all had different schedules. It was difficult at first getting the keys and into the apartment. Once there, more than an hour after posted check-in, the bed had not been changed. We called Carrie, who immediately sent someone to do so, which was great, but unfortunately it took away from our first afternoon. Overall, though, the stay was nice.

We had a nice stay at Carrie's place. 
It's like on the pictures.
The flat is very close to Hyde Park and
Oxford Street and the Underground. 
Good value for this money.

We had a nice stay at Carrie's place: very tiny room, but ok for a few nights. Bathroom and kitchen also fine. It's just a bit of a treasure hunt to get the keys: she did provide all the detailed information but it's not ideal if getting there at night after a long journey. Also the neighborhood is not particularly nice (but still, only 15-20 minutes walk from Hyde Park).

Carrie was easy to contact & quick to reply which was great. The house where you stay is in a good location for the underground, but is quite a 'seedy' location. We only walked straight to our room & we only stayed there to sleep. The linen was clean. The room is very tiny...you cannot open the closet doors all the way. And the bed pillows are very very flat.
It is a great place to stay if you just need a place to crash after sightseeing as we did. I would not stay here for any longer than a few days though.

It is a very nice flat which located in a good area in London. It is easy to go get different transportation such as train, underground and buses. The kitchen is very handy and resourceful. The room is a little bit smaller than I expected. However, the price was totally reasonable. I will try again next time. By the way, the shower was a little bit too hot.

Nice and clean room, though small but managable. Kitchen and bathroom clean and well equipped. We have not seen Carrie but shared the appartment with other guests from around the world.
Really good value!

We had to get the keys by ourselves but the instructions were very clear and we had no problem getting to our room.
Though a little small, the room is very comfortable and practical. It is also nicely decorated as is the rest of the flat.
The kitchen was the big plus as it's spacious and well equipped. It's a space to meet your roommates and cook if you feel like it.
Overall, it was a pleasant experience and we will consider staying here again if we come back to London!

Nice place, close to everything you may need during your stay (tube, grocery store...).
Clean apartment, neighbourhood is ok. 
It's awesome to be able to use the kitchen any time you need it. Fast wifi.

Great experience overall
I had a nice stay. Slept well at night, and got new friends at the nice kitchen. Will recommend.

Bon emplacement, calme, propre et pratique. 
Difficile de trouver la clé du premier coup. 
Nous avons regretté de ne pas avoir eu droit à une des plus grandes chambres....néanmoins à recommander, bon rapport qualité prix

Es war alles sehr sauber. Die Lage ist recht gut, mit dem Bus nur ein paar Stationen zur Oxfordstreet. Supermarkt ist gleich um die Ecke. Zimmer ist sehr klein, aber das sieht man auch auf dem Foto und ist für London City ja eher typisch :)
Everything went well, she gave us a perfect guidance about finding our apartment and the rules.

We had a really great stay in what was the smallest of four rooms in this flat. There were certainly a few draw backs, the hot water was out for 4 of the 8 days we were there. The fridge system was not clearly outlined and we mistakenly put our food on the wrong shelf only to have it thrown away when the couple in room 1 left. We also found a few things lacking such as cutlery, wash clothes in the kitchen, hand towels in the bathroom. Certainly not deal breakers but things that are nice to have around. We never saw Carrie and while we didn't try to contact her, the lack of contact from her personally when the hot water went out was a but unimpressive. Our Australian flatmates had no luck in contacting her in their 3 week stay themselves. That said, the location is great and for the price we would certainly stay again.
The reservation was canceled the day before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Felt very welcome at carries! Thank you very much for the clean room in a nice area

We stayed in room number 2, which was very very small, but OK concidering the price. The apartement was clean and as described on airbnb. The neighbourhood is not the best but fortunately the apartement is really close to a main road and tube station. Overall we enjoyed our stay in this apartement!

Siamo stati a Londra 2 settimane e ci siamo trovati benissimo.
Non abbiamo mai incontrato Carrie ma ci ha fornito prima della partenza una mappa dettagliata su come raggiungere la casa e come prendere le chiavi ed è stato tutto molto semplice. Inoltre è estremamente vicina alla stazione di Edgware Road della linea Bakerloo, e con solo qualche passo in più si raggiunge anche la Circle Line. Anche il supermercato è a pochi passi.
La casa è pulita e ordinata. La camera è come appare in foto, è effettivamente piccolina, ma una volta che ci siamo sistemati siamo stati bene, anche perchè  la usavamo solo per dormire, tutto il giorno eravamo in giro. Abbiamo sfruttato anche la cucina, attrezzata con tutto l'occorrente che può essere necessario.
Stando 2 settimane abbiam visto alternarsi numerosi coinquilini, tutti tranquilli con i quali non abbiam avuto nessun tipo di problema.
Consiglierei tranquillamente questa stanza e questa casa a chiunque voglia soggiornare a Londra stando in centro senza spendere troppo
We had a nice stay in your cozy apartment.
Everything who's so nice .we've got the keys so easy. Room was clean and cozy. Thank you for having us:)

POUR LA ROOM 2

Points positifs:
-Proximité avec les transports en commun
-Cuisine équipée
-Serviettes de bains fournies
-Télé + WIFI

Points négatifs:
-Poussière
-Salles communes pas assez souvent nettoyées
-Serviettes de bains changées au bout de 5 jours...
-Pas de volets et fenêtres s'ouvrant trop étroitement
-Quartier bruyant

En outre on a les prestations pour lesquelles on a payé (35€).

You get what you pay for. A cheap, ok clean place if you're on a small budget. Kitchen is really nice, shared bathroom needs to be maintained. Carpet in room no. 2 a bit smelly. Underground in walking distance which is a big plus. Overall good price-value relation.

You get what you pay for. This is a simple accommodation but worth the money because it is cheep. The room i small but the apartment has a nice kitchen and good connection with the WiFi. It is also near the Tube. We did not like the ruff staircase and the water pressure in the shower was bad. Overall we enjoyed our stay.

The location of the apartment is excellent, but, rather  than that, there is really nothing much you can be happy about at Carrie’s. The place is really, seriously, dirty, and we are not picky people.. but finding bread crumbs on the carpet in the room, expired stinky food in the fridge and two dead cockroaches in the kitchen cupboard it’s way too much. Both the food and the insects were there the day we got in and were still there three days later when we left. The last day a new, huge, cockroach was found in the sink, and another guest killed and littered it. Not to mention the conditions of the kettle or the jar containing sugar.  The room is incredibly tiny and the bed is a queen size, not double; there is hardly space to walk when you get in.  The lamp on the bedside table (only one bedside table, because the bed is squished to the wall so one has to climb over the other person in order to get up) was chipped and the pieces were inside the lamp, together with more than a spoonful of woolen dust. The other lamp was not functioning at all, and the handle of the window was broken as well and just sitting on the window sill. Our towels had holes in them and were definitely too old and super used.

Clean, safe, large kitchen with everything you'll need. Windows couldn't be closed or opened wide and heating was weird but nothing too bad. Don't worry about the constant sound of sirens, there's a police station nearby. Thanks

very nice room. The appartment is very well located, with bus lines to St pancras and king's cross stations and to the town center (Oxford Street,....). A shop close to the appartment is very usefull (opened to 11 pm).

The room is very tiny. If you are going in 2 people, I recommend to chose the larger one. The apartment is a 3 minutes walking from edgware road station, so you could say that is well located. The bathroom is also really small, but if you are looking for a place with a very good cost-benefit this is the right place. I would definetly come back.

We really enjoyed the stay :)
The possibility of have small talks with other travelers in the big bright kitchen is great!

FANTASTICO! anche se in casa eravamo parecchie persone (4 stanze per un totale di 10 persone), quiete e silenzio, servizi sempre puliti, cucina in ordine e pulita.
appartamento comodissimo per la vicinanza alla metro bakerloo line e gli autobus. 
bellissimo il bake & cake all' angolo della strada!!!

Tuvimos porblemas para entrar en el departamento, para conseguir la llave. Tuvimos que llamar a Carry quien no fue muy amable, estaba más preocupada porque no divulguemos sus datos que por ayudarnos a entrar al departamento. Superado este problema la habitación es muy linda pero muy pequeña, apenas espacio para circular. Las instalaciones del departamento fueron cómodas y todo muy limpio. Pero nunca conocimos a Carry, tuvimos a encontrar las cosas y aprender probando todo.

Highly recommended!!! The room, although a bit small, was very clean and quite comfortable. We got to know later that the one we had chosen was the smallest of all the rooms so if you have the possibility, choose another one and everything will be perfect then.

We have spent 3 nights in this flat and everything was alright, great stay. We haven't seen Carrie but the living with the other roomates went good. The flat (fully fitted) and his location are very convenient, we recommend!

Good location, 3-5 minutes walk to the underground,  many cafes, fast food shops and Tesco nearby. The room is a bit small but very comfortable. We enjoyed our stay at (phone number hidden) very much!

Conveniently located close to a tube station, plenty of amenities nearby, though the building the apartment is in is a bit dingy. The room itself was quite nice, and the rest of the apartment spacious and well-fitted.
Clean, cosy and great place to stay. better than a hotel

The proximity to attractions, public transport (bus, underground) is a definite plus. The bus stop around the corner can take you to Camden, Oxford St, Piccadilly Circus, Westminster Abbey, Buckingham Palace etc. in around 20-30mins. I prefer the bus because you get to see more & the tube makes me claustrophobic.

The location can seem a bit rough but we didn't have trouble. The check in process was easy enough.

The apartment was fairly clean in general, but the shower could use some maintenance. The room was clean, but it was so hot. (This is from an Australian!) The window can be open quite widely, so if there's a breeze, this is bearable. However, the street and courtyard is quite noisy with people chatting, laughing & some traffic noises well into the night. I recommend ear plugs if you're a light sleeper.

The kitchen has the bare essentials and the TV worked well.

With climate change and summers getting hotter, I think you guys should get a fan or A/C.

Carrie was quick to respond before check-in but did not reply to emails at all afterwards.

We stayed at Ingrebourne House. It is well located for London. The room is small but tidy, comfortable with just enough place for your dresses. There are everything in the beautiful,large kitchen what you need.  It was very interesting and exciting to get the keys... Other guests were very nice and silent. We are sorry that we couldn't meet Carry! Definitely highly recommended.
July 2013

This was our first experience with airbnb and it was all positive. The apartment was perfect for what we wanted, a clean bed, a hot shower and good location. The train station is just minutes away and you can walk to Hyde park in 10mins. The room we had was the smallest of all 4 rooms, however there was enough space for our bags and the bed was very comfortable. The lounge area was small but it didn't matter as we only ate breakfast there and then spent the day exploring the city. It was nice to returns home and exchange your days adventures and travel experiences  with others. Communications with the host were great and all directions and key pick up information were easy. Would recommend this apartment if your looking for a cheap and good place to stay. George  and josh - Australia

Carrie has been extremely helpful and her explications on how to find the address, keys etc. were perfect. The location was central and with easy access to transports.  
The room was cosy and clean, the flat clean as well and very quiet. We spent there a very nice and relaxing week-end and we won't hesitate to book again next time we go to london.
Great stay. Great location. Close to stations. Recommend to all.

Nice appartment in London, cheap and well located for London. The room is quite small but it is clean and tidy. The kitchen is biger than the pics and equipped with all comodities. Other guests were very nice and we enjoy their compagny, We had a look at the biger rooms, they are very nice and though we will book these for next time. 
You will not meet Carry, she sends you an email with all details needed to find the place safely, Thank you Carry, we had a nice stay at your place.

Beautiful room, great apartment, very well-furnished, and an awesome location. Definitely highly recommended. Perhaps the only snag is that despite the written instructions to collect the key from another apartment's masterlock box, I (and apparently several other guests) think that the apartment in front of which the masterlock is situated *is* the rented apartment. The owner of that apartment has to deal with people attempting to open her door with keys from their rented rooms, and asked us to relay that information to the host, in hopes that communication about the process of locating the apartment can be made clearer in a way that relieves this particular level of stress.
Thanks very much. We had lovely days in London and the room was cosy and close to the underground stations. Thank you very much. xx

review.response:
The guest who arrived the night before you took the room you had booked without me knowing for which I can only apologise. but the room you stayed in is exactly the same size.
There was no difference. I did speak with you on the phone and you seemed quite content with this arrangement.
Guests are asked to leave the key in the master lock I cannot be held responsible for keys going missing especially if no one phones me to tell me they are having a problem.
I can only apologise for the inconvenience.
review.comments:
-Souci dans la répartition des chambres(mauvaise communication).
Nous avions réservé pour une chambre et nous en avons fini dans une plus petite que l'initiale.Le prix des chambres était le même mais pas les chambres!
-Problème au niveau du bip pour rentrer dans l'immeuble. Nous n'en avions pas. La seule possibilité a été de s'arranger avec les autres habitants pas trop normal!
-sinon bonne localisation, propre.
-Dommage de devoir régler les problèmes par téléphone et de devoir s'arranger avec les autres habitants.Le voyage commençait bien...

I came to London with a friend for 6days. We stayed at Ingrebourne House and we had the most comfortable time there. The room is small but cosy. Good if you just want to have a nice sleep night.  If you want to work there is a table in the kitchen large enough for everyone. Our staying was very good and we couldn't have asked for a better location and service. Thank you Carrie, we will definetly contact you again if we come to London.
